      public void commitTransaction() throws SQLException

    • commitTransaction

      public void commitTransaction(boolean closeIfAutoClose) throws SQLException
      Commits the running transation or does nothing if not in a transaction.closes the connection after if auto close is set to true
      Parameters:
      closeIfAutoClose - if false will never close the connection
      Throws:
      SQLException
